abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of this Public Enterprise
            and Economic Management Project is to restore economic
            growth. This would be accomplished by reforming the public
            enterprise (PE) sector, by improving national plannning and
            financial management, and by improving human resource
            management. In support of these objectives technical
            assistance, supporting services and equipment would be
            provided.  The project would result in the improvement of
            the institutional framework of the PE sector, create
            momentum for rapid expansion of the reform program, render
            the budgetary and planning system more efficient and launch
            a process of improvement of the Government's personnel
            management function.
